short_summary: Establish contract(s) with five (5) option year periods for regularly scheduled and as-needed paper and cardboard recycling services.
description: This solicitation is to establish contract(s) with five (5) option year periods for regularly scheduled and as-needed paper and cardboard recycling services for nine (9) Service Canada Centres in Newfoundland and one (1) Service Canada Centre in Nova Scotia.
full_summary:
# Paper and Cardboard Recycling Services - Newfoundland and Labrador & Nova Scotia
## Solicitation Number: 100020747
### Tender Announcement
Employment and Social Development Canada invites bids for the provision of paper and cardboard recycling services for nine (9) Service Canada Centres in Newfoundland and one (1) Service Canada Centre in Nova Scotia.

### Solicitation Details
- **Solicitation Number: 100020747**
- **Amendment Number: 2**
- **Tender Closing Date: 2022-09-28T14:00:00**
- **Amendment Date: 2022-08-26**
- **Notice Type: Request for Proposal**

### Solicitation Description
This solicitation aims to establish contracts with the ability to provider service(s) to the listed locations over a period of five (5) option years. Bidders must demonstrate their capacity to provide the required services.

### Contract Details
- **Contracting Entity Name: Employment and Social Development Canada**
- **Contracting Entity Address: 142 Prom. du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 2K3, Canada**

### Bidder Inquiries
Inquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted to:

* Luedee, Stephanie
* Email: NC-SOLICITATIONS-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca

### Available Attachments
* Tender Documents (English & French)
* Quality Assurance (QA) Document
* RFP in English (download links available)

### Solicitation Information
This solicitation was announced on **2022-08-23** and closes on **2022-09-28T14:00:00**. 

### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to bidders who comply with the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

Please confirm with the implementing organization regarding the eligibility of your bid based on the set out trade agreements. 

### Geographic Regions
The service delivery will focus on nine (9) Service Canada Centres in Newfoundland and one (1) Service Canada Centre in Nova Scotia.
